languages.text: {n}Похоже, утрата зрения стала ударом для вашего сознания. Пульсирующая боль, дрожащие ноги... Вы теряетесь в мгле, окутавшей вас — теряетесь безвозвратно, лишь эхо далекого голоса Кибеллы оставляет какую-то надежду найти выход.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Похоже, утрата зрения стала настоящим ударом для вашего сознания. Пульсирующая боль, некрепко держущие ноги... Вы теряетесь в бесконечной мгле, окутавшей вас — теряетесь безвозвратно, лишь эхо далекого голоса Кибеллы оставляет вам какую-то надужду найти выход.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Похоже, утрата зрения стала ударом для вашего сознания. Пульсирующая боль, дрожащие ноги... Вы теряетесь в мгле, окутавшей вас — теряетесь безвозвратно, лишь эхо далекого голоса Кибеллы оставляет какую-то надежду найти выход.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind, your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the distant echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

{n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind, your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the distant echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

{n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

{n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

{n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Verlust deines Sehsinns muss sich auf dein Unterbewusstsein auswirken. Du kannst den pochenden Schmerz nicht aus deinen Gedanken verbannen. Deine Beine zittern ... Du fühlst dich für immer verloren in der Dunkelheit, ohne Ausweg, abgesehen von der schwachen Hoffnung, dem Echo von Kibellahs Stimme zu folgen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Verlust deines Sehsinns muss sich auf dein Unterbewusstsein auswirken. Du kannst den pochenden Schmerz nicht aus deinen Gedanken verbannen. Deine Beine zittern ... Du fühlst dich für immer verloren in der Dunkelheit, ohne Ausweg, abgesehen von der schwachen Hoffnung, dem Echo von Kibellahs Stimme zu folgen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La pérdida de la visión ha debido de afectar a tu subconsciente. No eres capaz de apartar el dolor palpitante de tu cabeza. Tus piernas tiemblan... Te sientes perdid{mf|o|a} para siempre en la oscuridad, sin más salida que la vaga esperanza de seguir el eco de la voz de Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pérdida de la visión ha debido de afectar a tu subconsciente. No eres capaz de apartar el dolor palpitante de tu cabeza. Tus piernas tiemblan... Te sientes perdid{mf|o|a} para siempre en la oscuridad, sin más salida que la vaga esperanza de seguir el eco de la voz de Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}視覚を失ったことは、潜在意識レベルで影響を与えているに違いない。ズキズキとする痛みが頭から離れない。足が震えている…キベラの声の反響を頼りに進むというかすかな希望を除けば、出口がなく、暗闇の中で永遠に彷徨っているように感じられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}視覚を失ったことは、潜在意識レベルで影響を与えているに違いない。ズキズキとする痛みが頭から離れない。足が震えている…キベラの声の反響を頼りに進むというかすかな希望を除けば、出口がなく、暗闇の中で永遠に彷徨っているように感じられる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}目不视物在某种程度上影响了你的潜意识，你无法将这种不断悸动的疼痛从脑海中抹除。你的双腿颤抖着……感觉自己永远迷失在了黑暗之中，没有任何出路。你只能怀着渺茫的希望，跟随绮贝菈声音的回声前进。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目不视物在某种程度上影响了你的潜意识，你无法将这种不断悸动的疼痛从脑海中抹除。你的双腿颤抖着……感觉自己永远迷失在了黑暗之中，没有任何出路。你只能怀着渺茫的希望，跟随绮贝菈声音的回声前进。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La perte de la vue a dû vous affecter à un niveau subconscient. Vous ne parvenez pas à passer outre la douleur lancinante. Vos jambes tremblent... Vous vous sentez à jamais {mf|perdu|perdue} dans les ténèbres, sans autre issue que le faible espoir de suivre l'écho de la voix de Kibellah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La perte de la vue a dû vous affecter à un niveau subconscient. Vous ne parvenez pas à passer outre la douleur lancinante. Vos jambes tremblent... Vous vous sentez à jamais {mf|perdu|perdue} dans les ténèbres, sans autre issue que le faible espoir de suivre l'écho de la voix de Kibellah.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Görüşünü kaybetmen, seni bilinçaltı seviyesinde etkilemiş olmalı. Zihninden o zonklayıp duran ağrıyı bir türlü atamıyorsun. Bacakların titriyor... Karanlıkta ebediyen kaybolmuş gibi hissediyorsun. Kibellah'nın sesinin yankılarını takip etmeye dair zayıf bir umut dışında çıkış yolun yokmuş gibi geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The loss of sight must have affected you on a subconscious level. You cannot get the throbbing pain out of your mind. Your legs are shaking... You feel forever lost in the darkness with no way out, other than the faint hope of following the echo of Kibellah's voice.{/n}
